column5: Has anyone ever use the illuminator jig? If so what did you think Pretty pricey but if they work it might be worth buying some.
gimmick...but i'll probably buy some to try out  Tony

I kinda get turned off by a company putting up a website and can't even spell the name of their hook supplier correctly. It doesn't take anything away from the product, it's just careless and reflects on their attitude in general.
